title: Eating to Fight Covid, with Dr Wiliam Li
description:
Jillian misses the gym, but is it safe to return? Plus, the benefits of yoga, and special guest Dr. William Li, author of “Eat to Beat Disease: The New Science of How Your Body Can Heal Itself” is on to talk about food as medicine and ways to boost our immune systems to help fight Covid-19.

Guest links:

DrWilliamLi.com

@DrWilliamLi

10 Things to Eat Right to Fight Back Against Covie-19 video:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ewhHWuPDhQI&feature=youtu.be


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

SKREWBALLWHISKEY.com for more info

FEETURES.com, promo code JILLIAN for $10 off your first pair
